HU - user wants to be told a joke
WE - query about weather
NE - current news
    NETE - technology news
EL - query relating to electronics or robotics
    ELMI microcontrollers
        ELMIPY programming in Micropython
PR - computer programming
    PRPY Python
        PRO.PY.MIPY Micropython
    PRPH PHP
    PRJS Javascript
        PRO.JS.CLI client (browser side) Javascript
        PRO.JS.SER server side Javascript (for example Node)
    PRJA Java
    PRGO Golang
    PRNE Microsoft C# or .NET
    PRC C or C++
        PRO.C.MIC C for microcontrollers
    PRAI AI related programming    
AI - AI related 
    AIPR AI related programming
    AIGE Other AI related inquiries    
TE - Technology
    TEGP Graphics cards

GE - user made a general query that does not fit into other categories.
